title: Envelope, "Westinghouse Envelope", ca. 1964
medium: Offset lithograph, embossed on cream paper
markings: Watermark: Cranes C Crest; beneath name, image of crane bending down
inscribed: Verso: imprinted in black ink, upper right (flap of envelope): Westinghouse Electric Corporation/ Industry and Defense Products; to the right of name: Westinghouse Building/ Gateway Center/ Pittsburgh Pennsylvania 15222
description: Cream business envelope. Recto: Embossed in gold, lower left corner, Westinghouse logo.; logo inside raised circle. Verso: imprinted in black, upper center-right, two text blocks Westinghouse's full name and address.  Indentation of embossed logo, lower right corner.

tombstone.epitaph:
Envelope, "Westinghouse Envelope", ca. 1964.
ca. 1964. Offset lithograph, embossed on cream paper. Gift of Marion S. Rand. 2002-11-47.
